name: Preschool
description: Age Range: 2.5 to 4 years Schedule: Monday - Friday: 8:30a - 12:00p (early care is available from 8:00a; after-school until 1:30, 3:00 or 4:00p) The lower school classrooms have a strong focus on social-emotional learning, school readiness, and lots of play! Children work on building connections, navigating friendships, learning routines, and self-help skills. Students are introduced to a variety of fine motor techniques, pre-literacy activities, and sensory experiences in a joyful and age-appro

howToGetIt: All the steps for admissions are located online at https://www.calvarynurseryschoolsf.org/admissions. For more information call or email office.
cost: This is a fee based service. Sliding scale is available with verified income requirements.
